content: The central path from the Shrine leads down a main road with more Censor Holders on both sides (they won't bother you if you don't bother them) leading to a large building guarded by a Dual-Blade Monk.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
The central path from the Shrine leads down a main road with more Censor Holders on both sides (they won't bother you if you don't bother them) leading to a large building guarded by a Dual-Blade Monk.
